prompts: Create a sleek, feline Pokemon with luxurious fur and piercing eyes.
Generate a Normal-type Pokemon that embodies elegance and grace.
Show me a cat-like creature with a shiny coat and a mischievous personality.
Imagine a Pokemon with a gentle demeanor that thrives in urban environments.
Design a Pokemon that resembles a Persian cat but has unique color patterns.

Make a representation of a Pokemon that is both friendly and cunning.
